experiences.title: Master Thesis
experiences.description: Researching the potential of generative AI for creating camouflage patterns. Working with large generative models like Stable Diffusion using the Diffusers library and PyTorch.

experiences.title: QA Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Worked with synthetic data and developed algorithms to detect artifacts and defects. Developed a QA system, helping Devant improve data quality and gain new tools for searching through their datasets. Used Python and image processing libraries such as OpenCV.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description: Developed and maintained the website for 120 new students in my program. Integrated Google APIs to display live calendars on the site and OpenAI API for a chatbot. Built with React and Next.js.

experiences.title: Lab Assistant
experiences.description: Assisted students in the course 'Introduction to Web Programming'. Topics included JavaScript, Node.js, and REST APIs.

experiences.title: Programming Mentor
experiences.description: Chair of the student-run programming support initiative on Norrköping campus. Helped students from various programs with programming support.
